text:
Usually, a save-as assumes subsequent saves will be made to the same file and 
thus JMeter should allow save-all (no regular save present ?). Now it always 
triggers a save-dialog with "Test plan.jmx" as name.
creator: Geert.Poels@skynet.be
mstover1@apache.org
text:
That's the purpose of Save-as.  This seems more like an enhancement request for
a "Save" feature.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
